0b1e709a-c5c4-99eb-16a1-faa167786802.description: Otter moms are pretty amazing. They float around on their backs, carrying their pups on their belly. But sometimes mama needs a break.
0b1e709a-c5c4-99eb-16a1-faa167786802.fullText: When it is time for Mama Otter to rest or hunt, she will blow air bubbles into her pups fur, to keep them floating. She will do this until they learn to swim. And you thought you knew all the amazing things about bubbles.
0b1e709a-c5c4-99eb-16a1-faa167786802.name: Bubbles are chill.

1f8790da-aafc-0acd-72b3-c47d0dcad958.description: Chances are blue plants and animals near you aren't blue. Their cell structure absorbs all but blue light!
1f8790da-aafc-0acd-72b3-c47d0dcad958.name: Blue in Nature

30ce18b4-30a1-6644-0dc1-745e8c3b5fd5.description: For ducks, they're shaped like corkscrews.
30ce18b4-30a1-6644-0dc1-745e8c3b5fd5.name: Not for Wine

374b09e3-9cc2-ec62-0ae5-beace2b73325.description: There are many creatures who evolved to be eyeless because their sight was so unused.
374b09e3-9cc2-ec62-0ae5-beace2b73325.fullText: These creatures, like fish and spiders, lived in environments where sight was basically useless. So they stopped wasting their energy. One such spider was found in a sink hole that is several billions of years old, and previously untouched by humanity.
374b09e3-9cc2-ec62-0ae5-beace2b73325.name: See What?

3bd8d709-4ced-0ad3-a0c4-07865a372067.description: The LOTR franchise was shot in New Zealand. Fans boosted tourism by flocking there to see filming sites. Coining "Tolkien Tourism."
3bd8d709-4ced-0ad3-a0c4-07865a372067.name: LOTR fans

493d61ea-3625-783a-9315-d1fe3ac77729.fullText: Chicken sexers are tasked with separating newborn chicks into male and female. They are trained by sorting chickens with a supervisor, who corrects them when they are wrong. Once trained, they are 100% accurate. Even though newborn chicks look identical. There is a scientific base for instinct. I learned this neat fact from an episode of "White Collar."
493d61ea-3625-783a-9315-d1fe3ac77729.name: Chicken Sexers

5036ea86-effe-25f3-6a02-f6febf5998de.description: Greenland was not actually named to mislead people to come to this icy getaway.
5036ea86-effe-25f3-6a02-f6febf5998de.name: Ice/Greenland Naming

50e5816e-554e-1956-eafe-e52db8770d86.description: After a certain time in space, Astronauts could not stand up to Earth's gravitational pull, and would die upon reentry. Here's Why.
50e5816e-554e-1956-eafe-e52db8770d86.name: Astronauts' Return

5dc5a8d9-eff1-d440-118f-5b1e7238b8a0.description: Salmon and Flamingos are two of nature's beloved pink creatures. Only they are not actually pink!
5dc5a8d9-eff1-d440-118f-5b1e7238b8a0.fullText: Wild Salmon and Flamingos get their color from their diet, krill. Farmed salmon, which is what you are likely eating, no matter the label, gets dyed. Most farmed salmon are fed kibble and look a mobbish grey color. So farmers dye them pink to make us willing to eat them. Check out "Adam Ruins Restaurants" to find out what other fishy things go on in the food industry.
5dc5a8d9-eff1-d440-118f-5b1e7238b8a0.name: Grey Salmon burger

65b46b4c-8bbc-982e-5144-a6293c141d95.description: Male cats have barbs on..... Poor Cat Mamas
65b46b4c-8bbc-982e-5144-a6293c141d95.name: Like wire

702d29c7-0b4f-ffa7-e9c5-f9fc49084600.description: Antarctica was not always frozen. Many Many dominos fell in exactly the right/wrong place.
702d29c7-0b4f-ffa7-e9c5-f9fc49084600.fullText: https://youtu.be/2r-IjEPojkw Check out this awesome sci-show video about how the coldest desert came to be.
702d29c7-0b4f-ffa7-e9c5-f9fc49084600.name: The Unfrozen

7553d6be-1b10-1372-c658-40792f6ce079.description: Axolotls can regrow amputated limbs many times over. Much like our favorite trashmouth antihero.
7553d6be-1b10-1372-c658-40792f6ce079.name: Axolotls + Deadpool

8f54a33e-4058-9e9d-6520-6b13fcd45f81.description: The cockroach can live up to three weeks after being decapitated.
8f54a33e-4058-9e9d-6520-6b13fcd45f81.name: Unkillable

a4590b4b-208e-69ef-07d2-3cc8df6ac9b9.description: The theory of the "Alpha-Omega" hierarchy of wolf packs is a myth.
a4590b4b-208e-69ef-07d2-3cc8df6ac9b9.fullText: The alpha male and alpha female overseeing their and omegas.... this is now a staple in pop culture, with all sorts of tv, movies, and fanart spawned from this idea. We even use it in our own relationships. Women saying they'll only date Alpha-males. This myth turned factoid is one of the most popular  falsehoods of our time. And it all started with a book that was one man's theory, not a fact. But it told such a brilliant story that people everywhere told it to their  friends, like it was as real as salt in the shaker.  The author spent the rest of his life trying to recall the book and tell people the truth. But no one would listen. For more details you can check out "Adam Ruins Everything- Alpha Males Do Not Exist," where I found this wild fact.
a4590b4b-208e-69ef-07d2-3cc8df6ac9b9.name: Alpha is a lie

b63aafde-eb7a-fa3f-7472-a37d08a08ca6.description: This one Octomom literally dies to bring her newborns out of the egg and into life.
b63aafde-eb7a-fa3f-7472-a37d08a08ca6.fullText:
This species of octopus finds a safe perch where she can lay over her eggs, and then does not move. Not for food. Not to pee. Not for anything. She waits for months or even years, shieding her eggs with her decomposing body. When the babies finally hatch, she floats away to finish dying in peace. Check out this amazing video to find out how we know this and about other extreme animal moms.

https://youtu.be/Gc6J59Hkc6M
b63aafde-eb7a-fa3f-7472-a37d08a08ca6.name: octomama

b73043c3-2019-d504-1609-50feec6c7eed.description: Pack your own TP if you plan to camp near a Gimpy Gimpy Tree. You do not want to wipe your butt with its leaves!!
b73043c3-2019-d504-1609-50feec6c7eed.name: Gympie Gympie Tree

d4a103b1-ab17-cf34-c09e-cc5a9266663a.description: The male lion sleeps 20 hours a day. The female does all the hunting.
d4a103b1-ab17-cf34-c09e-cc5a9266663a.fullText: Mama and her catches dinner, while Dad eats and protects from predators. There is only one Adult male lion in a standard pride of lions. The rest are adult females and cubs. Male cubs must challenge their father when they grow up. Or leave to find their own pride.
d4a103b1-ab17-cf34-c09e-cc5a9266663a.name: Sleepy Boy

d8d08f21-f49c-44fe-e73f-e988a6d44479.description: Mt.Rushmore was stolen from Native Americans. We then defaced this holy site with our leaders' carvings. Then tried to pay them off.
d8d08f21-f49c-44fe-e73f-e988a6d44479.name: Mount Theftmore

e349f35c-1696-1198-abaf-1a3e3b9fd38c.description: The menstrual and lunar cycles are not linked. This is a factoid.
e349f35c-1696-1198-abaf-1a3e3b9fd38c.name: Different Cyclea

e5b18457-9402-b410-0e80-783a091d86d3.description: Nessaea is the only butterfly with true blue pigment, with all other butterflies' color being a trick of the eyes.
e5b18457-9402-b410-0e80-783a091d86d3.name: True Blue Butterfly

f12146ed-0f8f-5c14-5541-107d12cc4cf2.description: Almond Milk is killing the environment.
f12146ed-0f8f-5c14-5541-107d12cc4cf2.fullText: The water to make just 16 almonds is 15 gallons. Almost a gallon per almond. This is terrible for Cali who is the main source of almond produce
f12146ed-0f8f-5c14-5541-107d12cc4cf2.name: Almond Milk Killer

f61026c9-6e7a-a022-41f0-2bdf5bccf49e.description: There is actually no sound in Outer Space.
f61026c9-6e7a-a022-41f0-2bdf5bccf49e.name: Space Concert

id1.description: A burger is a sandwich consisting of one or more cooked patties of ground meat, usually beef, placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun.
id1.name: Burger
